snippet.title: Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance is releasing on November 16th! Wishlist here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2299430/Shinogi_Chess_Club_2_Resistance/

Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance is the much anticipated sequel to Shinogi Chess Club, a hybrid-genre experience that combines visual novel storytelling with 3D exploration and a playable strategy game! Challenge dangerous opponents, uncover the origin of Himiko's dark secret, and confront new threats as the leader of the Shinogi Chess Club!

In the wake of the Typhoon Initiative's collapse, a new threat has risen to challenge the city's obsession with Shinogi Chess, a board game variant which has taken hold of countless schools across Japan. With the Spring Championships behind her, Himiko Masaki continues the search for her mother, and will stop at nothing to acquire power in pursuit of this goal. As she investigates new leads and unravels a sinister conspiracy, Himiko is driven down a path of vengeance, and discovers just how far she's willing to go for the truth.

Play the original Shinogi Chess Club here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1840060/Shinogi_Chess_Club/

#shinogi #chess #club #anime #visualnovel #visualnovelgames #gamedev #gameart #trailer #indiedev #unity3d #pcgaming #games

The music used in this trailer was composed by me, and will be featured in the game's OST upon release. The full HQ-version of the soundtrack will be available for purchase soon after the game goes live. Made with Unity. 

Be sure to wishlist Shinogi Chess Club 2 on Steam as it really helps a lot!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2299430/Shinogi_Chess_Club_2_Resistance/

~~LINKS~~

🐦Keep up with development by following me on Twitter! 
https://twitter.com/RobProductions

🌐I have an official website here!
https://www.robproductionsgames.com/

🎮You can see my previous games here!
https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=RobProductions

📷Check out my concept art and WIP screenshots over on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/robproductionsgames/

🎥Subscribe to the channel for more videos/trailers on Shinogi Chess Club 2 and some looks behind the scenes of my development process! 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVRHCqDn1UGPTDYEJKtaMRw
